sentences.sContent: My father often speaks of my grandmother.
sentences.sContent_eng: My father often speaks of my grandmother.
sentences.sCn: 我爸爸常常提起我的祖母。

sentences.sContent: The body of her grandmother reposes in the churchyard.
sentences.sContent_eng: The body of her grandmother reposes in the churchyard.
sentences.sCn: 她祖母的遗体长眠于教堂的墓地中。

words.tran: 祖父母；祖父或祖母；外祖父母；外祖父或外祖母

trans.tranOther: the mother of your mother or father
